storage-facilities-description: The proposed development includes a 50,000 litre diesel fuel storage tank constructed with double-wall containment system. The tank will be located in a purpose-built concrete bunded area with 110% capacity containment. All pipework will be above ground with leak detection systems. Emergency shut-off valves will be installed at strategic locations. The facility will comply with Control of Pollution (Oil Storage) (England) Regulations 2001.
